author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Followup to r28944.  Add support for depth multiple changelists to
parameters, use them for the C APIs.

author: glasser
msg: Instead of calculating paths that are too long and doing fiddly path
math to shrink them back down, use a new helper to make relative paths

author: cmpilato
msg: NOTE:  I had to put a kluge into changelist-cmd.c to deal with a
separate notification function/baton issue that cropped up while
Lose single 'changelist' in favor of a list of 'changelists'; add
(svn_wc_set_changelist): Reduce the reach of this function.  Handle
only a single path, let callers manage adminstrative access, and
now return errors for unversioned and directory items.  Also,
defer changelist comparison to callers, too.
parameters.  Now implement as a driver for an entries walk.
Lose single 'changelist' in favor of a list of 'changelists'; add
'depth' parameter.  Now implement as a driver for an entries walk.
(svn_cl__changelist): Massage this to make use of the revamped

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r28933, fix spurious changelist_tests.py 4 failure on Win32.
(diff_with_changelists): svn diff output is one of the few places that
Win32 uses '/' path separators, so expect that.

author: pburba
msg: Don't elide or inherit mergeinfo across a mixed revision working copy.
* subversion/include/svn_mergeinfo.h: Add a blurb to the mergeinfo prop
overview about the limitations of inheritance and elision in mixed rev WCs.
(svn_client__get_wc_mergeinfo): Don't crawl to a parent looking for
inherited mergeinfo if that parent is at a different working revision than
(mergeinfo_update_elision): Put some updates in before subtree merges so
elision and inheritance can still occur.
